name: A.R.A. (Adaptive Real-time Assistant)
description: Local AI System for Caregivers and their Care Recipients built off AXIOM and AuraLens

name: AXIOM
description: ARA's eXtensible Intent & Orchestration Machine - Event-driven virtual assistant runtime with local inference and privacy-first architecture

name: AuraLens
description: ARA's 'eyes' for client LOCAL behaviour analysis and automated HIPAA Compliant logging

name: Operation: TryEverythingNet
description: Image Denoiser via Traditional/Deep Learning methods. Tries all filterings(sometimes several iterations) to replicate 'clean' image

name: Eidos Compiler
description: Custom Lexical Analyzer and Syntax Parser for a simple, custom programming language
